snippet: In an age in which privacy seems a myth, in which nearly everything about everyone can be gleaned from social media, mysteries do persist, especially in families, to be revealed only after death.
abstract: Several prominent people have published accounts of how they were blindsided by jarring revelations about their loved ones after they died; stories reveal how secrets still persist even in an era in which privacy seems to be a myth and in which nearly everything about everyone can be gleaned from social media.
lead_paragraph: In an age in which privacy seems a myth, in which nearly everything about everyone can be gleaned from social media, mysteries do persist, especially in families, to be revealed only after death.

headline.seo: In an Age of Lessening Privacy, Some Family Secrets Persist
